summary: A transformer-based implementation of the Falcon causal language model, providing the core functionality for loading, configuring, and running a pretrained Falcon model to perform next-token prediction and text generation tasks.
business_intent: To empower applications that require high-quality natural language generation, such as chatbots, content creation tools, code assistants, and other AI-driven text services, by offering a ready-to-use Falcon causal language model.
